title: PITT (1993-1999) 001-020 COMPLETE plus 1/2, Hulk, Darkness X-ove
description:
These old Pitt comics can be found on TPB but the torrents either aren't seeded or are only seeded sometimes, so I thought it would be nice to compile and post a set.

This doesn't include Pitt Crew ((shakes head)) or some of the character's appearances in Youngblood #4 (reprinted as Pitt #1/2, which is included) or Gen 13 #2 or Supreme, etc., etc. But it does include the good crossovers Hulk/Pitt -- which reunited the "Incredible Hulk" team of Peter David and Dale Keown -- and Darkness/Pitt, written by Paul Jenkins. Anyway, it's something to read while you're waiting for Injustice to come out. Seed and enjoy!  --STF

------

From Atomic Avenue:

Pitt is Dale Keown's first work for Image Comics. Its star is a huge creature named Pitt, who shares his consciousness with an energy being named Jereb. Pitt was created by a splicing of human and Creed genes to become a deadly killing machine. Now, the very forces that created him have deemed him a traitor. Pitt fled to Earth where he must save not only himself, but a small child named Timmy from the galactic bruisers that want to kill them both.
